sections.doc_: ## Introduction
sections.cachedMarkedDoc: Introduction
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Introduction

sections.doc_: This is a sample template for a news article in AMP. It demonstrates the usage of AMP components which works well in news articles. Examples include social sharing, image galleries, personalized content, ads, and more.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc: This is a sample template for a news article in AMP. It demonstrates the usage of AMP components which works well in news articles. Examples include social sharing, image galleries, personalized content, ads, and more.
sections.normalizedDoc_: This is a sample template for a news article in AMP. It demonstrates the usage of AMP components which works well in news articles. Examples include social sharing, image galleries, personalized content, ads, and more.

sections.code:
<!doctype html>
<html âš¡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
      <title>Product Browse Page</title>
      <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>

sections.doc_: Additionally used AMP components must be imported in the header. Import `amp-carousel` to create a list of auto advancing promotions.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Additionally used AMP components must be imported in the header. Import `amp-carousel` to create a list of auto advancing promotions.

sections.doc_: Import `amp-list` to implement auto suggest search
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-list` to implement auto suggest search

sections.doc_: Import `amp-mustache` as a format template for `amp-list`
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-mustache` as a format template for `amp-list`

sections.doc_: Import `amp-form` to implement auto suggest search
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-form` to implement auto suggest search

sections.doc_: Import `amp-analytics` to monitor usage
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-analytics` to monitor usage

sections.doc_: Import `amp-fit-text` to fit text in the provided space
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-fit-text` to fit text in the provided space

sections.doc_: Import `amp-sidebar` to implement a menu
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-sidebar` to implement a menu

sections.doc_: Import `amp-bind` to implement filtering and sorting
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-bind` to implement filtering and sorting

sections.doc_: Import `amp-lightbox` to show the filtering and sorting section
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-lightbox` to show the filtering and sorting section

sections.doc_: Import `amp-selector` to implement auto suggest search
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import `amp-selector` to implement auto suggest search

sections.code:
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/e-commerce/product_browse_page/index.html">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-custom>
    :root {
      --color-text-light: #fff;
      --box-shadow-1: 0 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14), 0 1px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.14), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12);
      --space-1: .5rem;  /* 8px */
      --space-2: 1rem; /* 16px */
      --space-3: 1.5rem; /* 24px */
    }
    .menu-wrap {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
    }
    .menu-wrap > * {
      margin: 0 10px;
    }
    article#preview {
      background: var(--color-text-light);
    }
   #hero-images {
     object-fit: contain;
   }
   #hero-images .caption {
     text-align: center;
     position: absolute;
     bottom: 0;
     left: 0;
     right: 0;
     padding: var(--space-3);
     background: rgba(200,200,200,.5);
     color: var(--color-text-light);
     font-size: 36px;
     max-height: 30%;
     font-weight: 300;
   }
   .list-overflow {
     width: 160px;
     margin-top: 150px;
   }
   .refine {
     display: none;
   }
   .filter-mobile {
     display: none;
   }

     /* global style in order to bind global style in the iframe*/

   html, body {
     font-size: 16px;
     font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
     color: #48525C;
   }
   p {
     font-weight: 400;
     color: #48525c;
   }
   a {
     font-weight: bold;
     text-decoration: none;
     color: #005AF0;
   }
   label[for=sort] {
     margin: 20px;
   }
   .ampstart-btn {
     margin-bottom: 40px;
   }
   p.name + p.star {
     color: gold;
   }

   @media (min-width: 600px) {
     .refine {
       display:inline;
       float: left;
       width: 20%;
       box-shadow: var(--box-shadow-1);
       padding: var(--space-2);
     }
     .content {
       float: right;
       width: 80%;
     }
     .grid {
       display: flex;
       justify-content: space-around;
       flex-wrap: wrap;
     }
     .products {
       display: inline-block;
       margin: var(--space-2);
     }
   }
   @media (max-width: 500px) {
     .filter-mobile {
       display:inline;
     }
     .products {
       display: block;
       height: 100px;
       padding: 0 var(--space-1) 0 0;
     }
     .products amp-img {
       line-height: var(--space-3);
       font-weight: 400;
       font-size: var(--space-3);
       vertical-align: middle;
       float: left;
       margin-right: var(--space-1);
     }
   }
   #main-wrap {
     overflow: hidden;
   }
   #info-wrap {
     display: flex;
     justify-content: space-between;
     align-items: center;
     overflow: hidden;
     margin: var(--space-2)
   }
   .info {
     width: 50%;
     float: left;
   }
   amp-lightbox {
     background: var(--color-text-light);
     width: 100%;
     height: 100%;
     position: absolute;
   }
   #info-wrap .ampstart-input {
     width: 200px;
   }
   .autosuggest-container {
      position: relative;
    }

   .autosuggest-box {
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      background-color: var(--color-text-light);
      box-shadow: var(--box-shadow-1);
    }
  .recommendations, .bestsellers, .filter-section {
    margin: var(--space-2);
  }
  .filter-section > div:first-of-type {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 20px;
  }
</style>
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style>
<noscript>
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style>
</noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: ## Navigation
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Navigation

sections.doc_: Use the [amp-sidebar](/documentation/components/amp-sidebar) component to give customers the chance to quickly jump to any of your product categories
sections.normalizedDoc_: Use the [amp-sidebar](/documentation/components/amp-sidebar) component to give customers the chance to quickly jump to any of your product categories

sections.doc_: ## Header with search
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Header with search

sections.doc_:
AMP supports forms, which means you can directly integrate a product search into your AMPs. Here we implemented autosuggest, try searching for "Apple" and you should be able to select "Apple". Take a look at [autosuggest sample](/advanced/autosuggest/) for more details how autosuggest is implemented.

AMP doesn't support custom Javascript, but you can use CSS3 animations to enrich your page. The expanding text field when the search box is focused is implemented with CSS only.
hints: Keep this just for creating the change event
sections.normalizedDoc_:
AMP supports forms, which means you can directly integrate a product search into your AMPs. Here we implemented autosuggest, try searching for "Apple" and you should be able to select "Apple". Take a look at [autosuggest sample](/advanced/autosuggest/) for more details how autosuggest is implemented.

   AMP doesn't support custom Javascript, but you can use CSS3 animations to enrich your page. The expanding text field when the search box is focused is implemented with CSS only.

sections.doc_: ## A hero slider
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## A hero slider

sections.doc_:
The `amp-carousel` component can be used to quickly create full-bleed, auto-advancing slideshows showcasing your latest promotions. We

use the [amp-fit-text](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-fit-text-v0.1.md) component for the slide headers to automatically size the text to fit into the carousel.
sections.code: The 10 best Apples So much orange! So healthy!
sections.preview: The 10 best Apples So much orange! So healthy!
sections.normalizedDoc_:
The `amp-carousel` component can be used to quickly create full-bleed, auto-advancing slideshows showcasing your latest promotions. We
     use the [amp-fit-text](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-fit-text-v0.1.md) component for the slide headers to automatically size the text to fit into the carousel.

sections.doc_: ## Products configuration
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Products configuration

sections.doc_: The initial state and helper variables for the products are configured by amp-state.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The initial state and helper variables for the products are configured by amp-state.

sections.doc_: ## Filter and sorting
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Filter and sorting

sections.doc_:
We implemented filtering and ordering by combining `amp-bind` and `amp-list`. For filtering, we update, via `amp-bind`, the `src` of `amp-list` based on the color selection.

Similarly, we use a select option to allow the user to sort products based on price and we then modify the `src` url of `amp-list`.
sections.code:
Filter results

Color
sections.preview:
Filter results

Color
sections.normalizedDoc_:
We implemented filtering and ordering by combining `amp-bind` and `amp-list`. For filtering, we update, via `amp-bind`, the `src` of `amp-list` based on the color selection.

   Similarly, we use a select option to allow the user to sort products based on price and we then modify the `src` url of `amp-list`.

sections.doc_: We implemented an additional lightbox for the filter section on mobile.

sections.normalizedDoc_: The `amp-carousel` supports also a more traditional carousel mode.

sections.doc_: ## Bestsellers
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Bestsellers

sections.doc_:
With AMP, you can easily pull in different latest offers or highlights without changing the page. To do so, just use `amp-list` to fire a CORS request to a JSON endpoint which supplies the list of related products. These are populated into an amp-mustache template on the client.

Learn more about `amp-list` [here](/documentation/components/amp-list)
sections.code: Bestsellers
sections.preview: Bestsellers
sections.normalizedDoc_:
With AMP, you can easily pull in different latest offers or highlights without changing the page. To do so, just use `amp-list` to fire a CORS request to a JSON endpoint which supplies the list of related products. These are populated into an amp-mustache template on the client.
   Learn more about `amp-list` [here](/documentation/components/amp-list)

sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Autosuggest configuration

sections.doc_: The initial state and helper variables for the product autosuggest are configured by amp-state.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The initial state and helper variables for the product autosuggest are configured by amp-state.

sections.doc_: ## User analytics
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## User analytics

sections.doc_: Analytics must be configured in the body. Here we use Google Analytics to track pageviews.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Analytics must be configured in the body. Here we use Google Analytics to track pageviews.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
      <title>Product Browse Page</title>
      <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-carousel" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-carousel-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-list" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-list-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-template="amp-mustache" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-mustache-0.2.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-form" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-form-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-analytics" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-fit-text" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-fit-text-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-sidebar" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-sidebar-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-bind" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-bind-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-lightbox" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-lightbox-0.1.js"></script>
      <script async custom-element="amp-selector" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-selector-0.1.js"></script>
      <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/e-commerce/product_browse_page/index.html">
      <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
      <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style>
      <noscript>
        <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style>
      </noscript>

document._description: This is a sample template for a news article in AMP.
